value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Basic Guide for ALL RACES (updated 2017)
value.excerpt: A live guide to Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void - Covering the basics and build orders for all of the races, and covering the important decisions to be made early in the game.  Not a step by step guide but a demonstration once you have the very basics of the units and races!
